title: Services
subtitle: I create websites, web applications and mock-ups. Maybe you will be interest in something.

boxes.title: WEB Applications
boxes.description: I create web applications, usually using frameworks and JavaScript libraries. My applications are very efficient, and made at the highest level.

boxes.title: Websites
boxes.description: I create websites with the latest technology, so they are very fast. I can also prepare them for SEO.

boxes.title: UX/UI Design
boxes.description: I design mock-ups for web applications and websites. They are intuitive, modern, and very precise.

boxes.title: Code review
boxes.description: I'm analyzing a code written by another programmer. I can also point out some mistakes, bad practices, and recommend some change.

boxes.title: Optimization of websites and applications
boxes.description: I optimize websites to be as fast as possible. This is important for SEO and for gaining new customers.
